actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on the Judiciary.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on the Judiciary, S. Rept. 94-801.
Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend title 28, United States Code, to provide that Bottineau, McHenry, Pierce, Sheridan and Wells Counties, North Dakota, shall be included in the Northwestern Division of the Judicial District of North Dakota.

summary.text: Transfers Sheridan and Wells Counties, North Dakota, from the Southeastern Division to the Northwestern Division of the Judicial District of North Dakota. Transfers Baltineau, McHeary, and Pierce Counties, North Dakota, from the Northeastern Division to the Northwestern Division of the Judicial District of North Dakota.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 28, United States Code, to provide that Bottineau, McHenry, Pierce, Sheridan and Wells Counties, North Dakota, shall be included in the Northwestern Division of the Judicial District of North Dakota.
